attributes.action: Make it illegal to leave a pet for dead in the road
attributes.additional_details: Please take the pet to a local vet where it can be scanned for a chip and its family can have the chance to say goodbye
attributes.background: For pet owners, there is nothing more heartbreaking than loosing an animal to a road accident. Too many people however hit and run! To many owners their pets are their children, yet if a human child was in a hit and run it would be a different outcome! How is that fair?!
